mapper.select: select DISTINCT s.user_id,s.name docname,z.* from tb_user s right join (select a.*,c.project_id,c.name projectname,c.price,e.param_id,e.name keshi,d.patient_id patid,d.project_id proid,d.state,d.user_id uid,d.balance,d.patient_project_id,h.company_id cid,h.name cname,h.deposit from tb_patient a,tb_patient_combo g,tb_project c,tb_project_combo b,tb_patient_project d,tb_param e,tb_company h where a.patient_id=g.patient_id and (a.`code`=#{0} or a.phone=#{0}) and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and d.project_id=c.project_id and g.combo_id=b.combo_id and c.project_id=b.project_id and c.param_id=e.param_id and a.company_id=h.company_id)z on s.user_id=z.uid order by z.name
select distinct * from tb_brief a,tb_detail_project b,tb_detail c where a.detail_id=b.detail_id and b.detail_id=c.detail_id and b.project_id=#{0} and a.patient_id=#{1} order by c.type
select * from tb_brief a,tb_detail b,tb_patient c where a.detail_id=b.detail_id and a.patient_id=c.patient_id and c.code=#{0} order by b.type desc
select * from tb_user where account=#{0} and pwd=#{1};

select a.name uname,d.name pname,e.menu_id,e.name,e.link,e.superior from tb_user a,tb_role_dept b,tb_role_power c,tb_power d,tb_menu e WHERE a.role_dept_id=b.role_dept_id and b.role_id=c.role_id and c.power_id = d.power_id and d.menu_id=e.menu_id and user_id=#{0} and a.role_dept_id=#{1}
mapper.update: update tb_patient_project set balance='已退费',state='已退费' where patient_project_id=#{patient_project_id}
mapper.select: select b.name from tb_role_dept a,tb_role b where a.role_id=b.role_id and a.role_dept_id=#{role_dept_id}
select name from tb_param where param_id=#{param_id}
